commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content: <?php include "config.php"; $error_msg = ""; if (isset($_POST["send"])){ $email = $_POST["email"]; $pass = $_POST["pass"]; $sql = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE email ='$email'"; $result = mysqli_query($conn , $sql); if (mysqli_num_rows($result)>0){ $user = mysqli_fetch_assoc($result); if(password_verify($pass , $user["password"])){ header("Location: dashboard.php"); exit(); }else{ $error_msg = " Incorrect password!"; } }else{ $error_msg = " Email not found!"; } } mysqli_close($conn); ?>
